amendment.description: An amendment numbered 50 printed in Part B of House Report 118-559 to prohibit the use of funds from being used to administer or enforce National Security Memorandum 20 (National Security Memorandum on Safeguards and Accountability With Respect to Transferred Defense Articles and Defense Services).
amendment.purpose: Amendment prohibits the use of funds from being used to administer or enforce National Security Memorandum 20 (National Security Memorandum on Safeguards and Accountability With Respect to Transferred Defense Articles and Defense Services).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A027) Agreed to by recorded vote: 216 - 197 (Roll no. 314).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A027) Agreed to by recorded vote: 216 - 197 (Roll no. 314).
